title: Software Engineer Portfolio
subtitle: Portfolio Website
description: Responsive portfolio website I designed and built from scratch using React and react-bootstrap.

title: Travel Stories
subtitle: Winning Hackathon Submission
description: The 'Travel Stories' app was built by engineers Pawan Kumar, Ankit Singh and Angad Virk (me), and designer Maulika Lisa in two days for the 2022 MakeMyTrip Hackathon. The idea was proposed by product manager Anuj Kumar, and we ended up winning the First Prize out of 30 teams in the Hackathon.

title: Weather App (iOS)
subtitle: Course Final Project
description: A neat iOS App built using SwiftUI. The user enters a location, and the App presents weather information for that location to the user in a clean-looking UI that is easy to parse.

title: Siitch
subtitle: Project Management for a Startup
description: I served as project manager for Siitch in late 2021. Together, our team of 8 built out the Compare Tool, Calculator Tool, and Camera Tool for the iOS App using React Native, over the course of 3 months. This included image recognition using ML and Firebase Database integration.

title: Get-It-Done Timer
subtitle: JavaScript Study Timer
description: Simple study timer built using HTML, CSS & JavaScript. Inspiration: the Pomodoro focus technique.

title: FoxDash
subtitle: 2D Platformer Game (Unity)
description: A 2D Platformer Game made in Unity. Everything done from scratch by me, except artwork, which is from the Unity Asset Store.
